settings.name: Sulfate Free
settings.description: Sulfates are a type of detergent that can cause irritation and dryness.

settings.name: Paraben Free
settings.description: Parabens are a type of preservative that can cause irritation and dryness.

settings.name: No Drying Alcohol
settings.description: Drying alcohols are used to remove moisture from the hair and skin, and can cause irritation and dryness.

settings.name: Silicone Free
settings.description: Avoiding all silicones even water-soluble ones.

settings.name: Mild Detergents Only
settings.description: Only mild detergents are allowed, other detergents are marked as warning.

settings.name: No Astringents
settings.description: Astringents can be drying and irritating.

settings.name: Caution Silicones
settings.description: All silicones should be approached with caution.

settings.name: No Waxes
settings.description: Avoiding all waxes except water soluble ones.
